name: Tap Romantics
description:
This game is a casual strategy game where players need to click to eliminate monsters within a specified time and accumulate attack power. Click on 2 or more identical monsters for elimination, and the more monsters eliminated, the higher the attack power. In the battle phase, players will use accumulated attack power to attack enemies while also facing enemy counterattacks.
The enemies in the game are all beautiful girl characters. Players will receive talent points and various exquisite CG rewards after defeating them. Within the specified time, players need to click and eliminate enough monsters to attack enemies. After each round, the game will display the damage caused by the player, which is directly proportional to the player's attack power and the number of monsters eliminated.
In the game, players need to carefully choose whether to eliminate more monsters in the current round to accumulate higher attack power or to reserve some monsters for better damage to enemies in the next round. The strategic decisions made by players will directly influence the outcome of the battles.
